writeCentered(String, int) - Method in class GameEngine.TextOverlay
Writes a text centered on the overlay on the provided index the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
writeLeft(String, int) - Method in class GameEngine.TextOverlay
Writes a text aligned to the left of the overlay the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
writeParagraph(String, int) - Method in class GameEngine.TextOverlay
Writes a paragraph aligned to the left of the overlay, possibly spanning multiple lines the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid nothing will be written
writeRight(String, int) - Method in class GameEngine.TextOverlay
Writes a text aligned to the right of the overlay the 0 index is the top of the overlay if the index is invalid or if the text is too big, nothing will be written
